attributes.action: educate parents with other ways to discipline their children and help the youth of today, else make smacking legal again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government has made it illegal for parents to smack their children - but has made little effort to educate parents with other effective ways of discipline.

Teenagers should go through parenting courses as a compulsary lesson - why do they have to do physical education and religious education, but parenting (which is something near enough every human on the planet is going to need) isn't compulsory?

Sign the petition and help common sense.
